article_title: Why some retailers choose Tulsa over Oklahoma City as site

article_metadata.author: Associated Press

og.description: Costco, the second-largest chain retailer in the United States behind Wal-Mart, will open its first 148,000-square-foot Oklahoma store in Tulsa this summer. Other retailers have chosen to enter Oklahoma City
